asset.assetPromotionTitle: FREE month of service on us
asset.assetPromotionText: Get an account credit up to $35 (new customers only)
asset.learnMoreText: Learn more about the Free Month of Service This phone must activate on the $35 Data Boost plan to be eligible.
asset.description: Pocket a lot of power with the slim and strong Samsung Array. A large screen and full, slide-out QWERTY keyboard mean texting, email and social media are always at your fingertips. This phone is certified pre-owned.
